<div style="width=80%;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;">
<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
This dataset offers yearly data on the spatial extent of permanent and seasonal water. The original dataset, a classification of water seasonality with a  30 m resolution, was aggregated to 300 m. The output depict per-pixel percentages of permanent and seasonal water, as well as the percentage of missing data. This data was collected through Google Earth Engine (GEE). 
</p>

<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">masDMT query</h3>
<div style="width=80%;margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;background-color:#777777;">
```{r eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
# data call without specifying subdataset and resolution
list_data("GSW")

# data call for specific subdataset 
list_data("GSW/permanent")

# data call to subdataset with a specific resolution
list_data("GSW/permanent/300m")
```
